mapper.select: select id, userName, password, phone, email, birthday, regTime, lastLoginTime, areas1, areas2, areas3, areasArr from t_members where userName=#{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into t_members ( userName, password, phone, email, birthday, regTime, lastLoginTime, areas1, areas2, areas3, areasArr)values (#{userName},#{password},#{phone},#{email},#{birthday},#{regTime},#{lastLoginTime},#{areas1},#{areas2},#{areas3},#{areasArr})
